author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Hardeep Singh Tiwana has a message for you: launch windows don't stay open forever!

Cyber Week is your chance to join the community of Kubestronauts and Golden Kubestronauts who’ve pushed their Kubernetes skills farther and validated them with credentials employers trust.

SAVE 50% on every Kubestronaut/Golden Kubestronaut bundle, including upgrade paths for CKA and CKAD holders. If you're ready to level up your cloud native career trajectory, this is the week to move.

🚀 5 Kubestronaut paths
🚀 All half-price
🚀 Ends December 9

Start your ascent: https://hubs.la/Q03V4RL70 

✳️ BONUS! Get a US$100 gift voucher to use for courses & certifications in 2026! 

#CloudNative #Kubernetes #Kubestronaut #CNCF #Linux #CyberMonday #CKA #CKAD
title: Hardeep Singh Tiwana has a message for you: launch windows don't stay open forever!
